title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, January 10, 2021
description: Today, for her birthday, we feature the poem “Against Endings” by Dorianne Laux. She advises, “Any good poem is asking you simply to slow down.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today, for her birthday, we feature the poem “Against Endings” by Dorianne Laux. She advises, “Any good poem is asking you simply to slow down.”
